article: Jimmy lives in London and he began to swim a few months ago. He  _  swimming, and he often goes to the swimming pool near his  _  with his mother and swims there for  an hour  or two. One day his mother said, "You  _  quite well now. And you want to see the sea, don't you? Your father and I are going to  _  you there on Sunday, and you are going to swim in the  sea  . It's not cold now, and it's much nicer than a swimming pool." Jimmy's parents took him  _  the sea in their  _  on Sunday. They  _  at the side of a small harbor . Jimmy got out and looked at the sea for a long time, but he was not very  _  . Then he asked his mother, "Which is the shallow end ?"
